timeline.message: Chunkload colony if partially loaded already

timeline.bodyText: rename to chunk load colony, easier understandable
timeline.author: someaddons

replies.bodyText: I wanted to avoid calling it that because people will confuse it with "my colony is always chunkloaded with it even I'm not in range or offline"
replies.author: Raycoms

timeline.bodyText: I'd call this updateChunkLoadTimer() and mention that its updating the timer or unloading the chunks when the time runs out
timeline.author: someaddons

timeline.bodyText: move this to worldTickSlow instead, here its only updated when the colony is not loaded
timeline.author: someaddons

replies.bodyText: It's in both. We need it in both, else it won't unload it when the player is not around. (offline or far away)
replies.author: Raycoms

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
              "minecolonies.config.forceloadcolony.comment": "Whether if part of the colony is loaded, all chunks should be kept loaded by force. [Default: false]",
          
          
            
              "minecolonies.config.forceloadcolony.comment": "If part of the colony is loaded by an owner/officer, the entire colony should be kept loaded. [Default: false]",
